entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -35.6°C

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
